TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當變更清單中的項目時，就會發生事件。An event occurs whenever the item in a list is changed. 例如，清單項目的文字變更為新值時，會發生此事件。For example, this event will occur when the text of the list item is changed to a new value. 當項目，會因為要加入新項目移動到新的位置清單中，不會引發這個事件。This event is not raised when the item is moved to a new position within the list because of a new item being added. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`CurrencyManager1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CurrencyManager1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#191](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#191)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#191](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#191)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 指示清單中變更項目的位置。

span.span: Indicates the position of the item being changed within the list.

value.span: 變更的項目之以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index to the item being changed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`CurrencyManager1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CurrencyManager1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#191](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#191)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#191](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#191)]
